## Checklist

- [ ] `pytest` — all tests pass
- [ ] `ruff check radsim/` — zero lint errors
- [ ] New functionality has tests
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets, API keys, or tokens
- [ ] No new dependencies (or discussed in an issue first)
- [ ] Code follows [Radical Simplicity](../CONTRIBUTING.md#code-standards) principles
- [ ] Only files relevant to this change are modified
